Package org.engine.input

Class MouseInput

java.lang.Object
org.engine.input.MouseInput
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseListener, com.jogamp.newt.event.NEWTEventListener, java.util.EventListener
public class MouseInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseListener
The MouseInput class implements the MouseListener interface and handles all the mouse-related events that the rest of the engine needs. Only the getter methods should be used by users outside of this class since the others are automatic responses to mouse events

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static int getIsoX()
    Returns the isometric x coordinate of the mouse pointer.
    static int getIsoY()
    Returns the isometric y coordinate of the mouse pointer.
    static boolean getMouseHeld​(short button)
    Checks whether the given mouse button was held down for more than one update cycle.
    static boolean getMousePressed​(short button)
    Checks whether the given mouse button was pressed.
    static double getPixelX()
    Returns the x position of the mouse on the in-game screen, based on the renderer and the camera.
    static double getPixelY()
    Returns the y position of the mouse on the in-game screen, based on the renderer and the camera.
    static double getRealPixelX()
    Returns the x position of the mouse on the actual screen of the device running the game
    static double getRealPixelY()
    Returns the y position of the mouse on the actual screen of the device running the game
    static boolean hasMoved()
    Checks whether the mouse has moved from its previously stored position during the last update cycle.
    void mouseClicked​(com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Not used, the mousePressed method offers the desired functionality
    void mouseDragged​(com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Automatically gets called by the listener when the mouse is held and moved, updates its position accordingly
    void mouseEntered​(com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Not implemented
    void mouseExited​(com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Not implemented
    void mouseMoved​(com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Automatically gets called by the listener when the mouse is moved, updates the saved mouse position accordingly
    void mousePressed​(com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Automatically called in the case of a mouse event by the listener, sets the value corresponding to the button causing the event to true
    void mouseReleased​(com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Automatically called in the case of a mouse event by the listener, sets the value corresponding to the button causing the event to false
    void mouseWheelMoved​(com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Not implemented
    static void update()

  • Method Details

    • update

      public static void update()
      Updates all the stored values. Should be called once per update cycle.

    • mousePressed

      public void mousePressed​(com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Automatically called in the case of a mouse event by the listener, sets the value corresponding to the button causing the event to true
      Specified by:
      mousePressed in interface com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseListener

    • mouseReleased

      public void mouseReleased​(com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Automatically called in the case of a mouse event by the listener, sets the value corresponding to the button causing the event to false
      Specified by:
      mouseReleased in interface com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseListener

    • mouseMoved

      public void mouseMoved​(com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Automatically gets called by the listener when the mouse is moved, updates the saved mouse position accordingly
      Specified by:
      mouseMoved in interface com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseListener

    • getIsoX

      public static int getIsoX()
      Returns the isometric x coordinate of the mouse pointer. In case the isometric values were not updated since the last time the mouse was moved, it computes and sets the new ones before returning
      Returns:
      the horizontal position on the isometric grid as an integer

    • getIsoY

      public static int getIsoY()
      Returns the isometric y coordinate of the mouse pointer. In case the isometric values were not updated since the last time the mouse was moved, it computes and sets the new ones before returning
      Returns:
      the horizontal position on the isometric grid as an integer

    • getPixelX

      public static double getPixelX()
      Returns the x position of the mouse on the in-game screen, based on the renderer and the camera.
      Returns:
      the horizontal mouse coordinate as a double

    • getPixelY

      public static double getPixelY()
      Returns the y position of the mouse on the in-game screen, based on the renderer and the camera.
      Returns:
      the vertical mouse coordinate as a double

    • getRealPixelX

      public static double getRealPixelX()
      Returns the x position of the mouse on the actual screen of the device running the game
      Returns:
      mouseX as a double

    • getRealPixelY

      public static double getRealPixelY()
      Returns the y position of the mouse on the actual screen of the device running the game
      Returns:
      mouseY as a double

    • getMousePressed

      public static boolean getMousePressed​(short button)
      Checks whether the given mouse button was pressed.
      Parameters:
      button - short value of the button (constants provided in the jogl awt MouseEvent class)

    • getMouseHeld

      public static boolean getMouseHeld​(short button)
      Checks whether the given mouse button was held down for more than one update cycle.

    • hasMoved

      public static boolean hasMoved()
      Checks whether the mouse has moved from its previously stored position during the last update cycle.
